file_content.text: This is a restricted area. There have been no security breaches for the past... one hundred and eleven thousand, three hundred and twenty-five days.
Please show your credentials to enter.
Have you been guarding this place for three hundred years?
That's a lot of days.
That is correct.
Is this the Taris Archive?
What is this place?
Yes.
You try to stop me from going in there, I'm ripping out your voicebox.
Let me pass.
While I am not programmed to fight, there are numerous automated defenses in place.
My programming appears to contain a contradiction. I am instructed only to open this door to a member of the Tarisian government.
But when the archive was brought online, all members of the ruling government were contained within. I have received no information on their successors.
This place has been a wasteland for three hundred years. There is no government.
Taris was destroyed.
Ah, let me update my programs... my fall-through under that condition is to open only to representatives of the Galactic Republic.
What do you mean they were "contained within"?
Contained within...?
I am not authorized to reveal the workings of the archive to anyone but a representative of the Galactic Republic.
Is that you?
I am a member of the Jedi Order and Galactic Republic.
Yes.
I am a lieutenant of Havoc Squad, of the Republic Armed Forces.
Yes.
Yeah, I, uh, do some work for the Republic now and then.
Sure.
Excellent. Welcome to the Taris Archive.
Do you need an ID number or anything...?
Maybe.
My programmers don't seem to have considered the specifics of this situation very thoroughly. Perhaps you can ask them....
I don't have time for this.
I'm going in.
Get out of my way!
I'm going in.
Alert! Alert! Intruder!
That's odd. The defenses appear inoperational....
This is the ruling government of Taris, as last appointed, plus representatives of every major science and industry.
Their final wish was to be thawed when Taris was once more in the hands of the Republic. Here is data on all those contained within.
My programming instructions end here.
This is a restricted area.
I'll deliver this right away.
Tell me more.
You want me to do something?
